text: Morton Community Unit School 709 is a unit school district in Morton, Illinois. it was founded in 1970. The school superintendent is Dr. Craig Smock since 2022. It has seven schools, including Morton High School, Grundy Elementary School, Morton Academy, Jefferson Elementary School, Lettie Brown Elementary School, Lincoln Elementary School and Morton Junior High School. ==References== Category:School districts in the United States Category:1970 establishments in the United States Category:1970s establishments in Illinois
title: Morton Community Unit School District 709
